meanings.definition: A system of betting on races in which the winners divide the total amount bet in proportion to their wagers.
meanings.sent1: In parimutuel betting, the winners share the money based on their bets.
meanings.sent2: The parimutuel system ensures fair distribution of winnings among the winning bettors.
meanings.sent3: At the racetrack, the parimutuel system made sure everyone got their fair share of the prize.
meanings.sent4: The concept of parimutuel betting is like a communal pot where the lucky ones take their share.
meanings.sent5: The parimutuel method makes the outcome of the race even more exciting for the participants.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a system of betting on races in which the winners divide the total amount bet in proportion to their wagers.
meanings.sent1: The parimutuel odds determine the payout for each winning bet.
meanings.sent2: Participants in parimutuel races eagerly await the final results to see their rewards.
meanings.sent3: The parimutuel approach adds an element of fairness and excitement to the betting process.
meanings.sent4: Her parimutuel strategy was to carefully analyze the odds before placing her bet.
meanings.sent5: The parimutuel nature of the competition made every participant feel equally invested in the outcome.
